discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
To fulfill the project manager's request of providing a list of rejected and deferred requirements for the test readiness review with the customer, the business analyst should have done C. Track rejected requirements in the system requirements verification matrix.

The system requirements verification matrix (also known as the traceability matrix) is a tool used to track and trace requirements throughout the project lifecycle. It provides a structured way to link requirements to their verification activities, such as testing, to ensure that all requirements are adequately addressed.

choices.B: Set up a change control board to track the number of rejections.

choices.A: Limit the number of rejected requirements on the project.
